wikipedia_page.main: Peter William Watson (1761–1830) was an English merchant and botanist.

response: Still in deacon's orders Milner left Thorp Arch to become headmaster of Hull Grammar School. There his pupils included William Dealtry, Samuel Marsden, George Pryme, Thomas Perronet Thompson, and Peter William Watson.
*Peter William Watson (1761–1830), English merchant and botanist
